sections.PURPOSE: of this Team STXs is to train fire teams in Battle Drills 1, 3, 5, and develop TLs leadership and tactical proficiency.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Create STXs lanes
Conduct Mounted MVT to the Range
PLs, PSGs, and SLs observe and instruct their fire teams through numerous STXs lanes
sections.END STATE:
All Kronos Troop Fire Teams successful conduct numerous day and night iterations of Team STXs, and conduct force-on-force training on the final day.
Training Objectives:
Team React to Contact Team conducts Frontal Assault on enemy OP
Team conducts Battle Drill 3
Team Knocks out and clears a bunker Team Leader sends SPOTREP Fire Teams gain experience on their weapon systems, managing rates of fire, and buddy team bounding
Resourcing
CLI: A-M-A Rations Cycle
CLIII: 2liters CLP
CLIV: 250 Sandbags, 2x Plywood or 2x Pallets
CLV: Requested 21,600 5.56 Blank, 25,200 L5.56 Linked Blank, 36 M18 Smoke Grenades CLVIII: By PLT, x1 Stryker, x1 Medic Misc: 2x 10lb Fire extinguishers (coordinating with DISTRO)
Back Side Support
Instructors/Lane Walkers: PLs, PSGs, SLs
Ammo Point: x1 NCO, x2 Ammo Guard during operation
sections.MISSION:
K TRP, 3/2CR conducts Teams STX for all Kronos Troop Fire Teams at RZ A on 16-19 JAN 2024. Team STXs will provide Fire Teams training in preparation for Team, Squad, and PLT live fires.
